TopicTitle: Can anyone confirm that the new version of KSP, KSP 1.10 works on MacOS Catalina?

Articles.Content: Can anyone confirm that the new KSP 1.10 works with MacOS Catalina? I’m stuck with 1.4 and tried to download 1.9, which didn’t work so well, so can anyone confirm that 1.10 works with MacOS Catalina?

34 minutes ago, Kermandd said:

Can anyone confirm that the new KSP 1.10 works with MacOS Catalina? I’m stuck with 1.4 and tried to download 1.9, which didn’t work so well, so can anyone confirm that 1.10 works with MacOS Catalina?

Not sure. I'm downloading 1.10 at the moment with the DLC's. I will let everybody know in this thread.

EDIT: 1.9.1 worked reasonably well, with few glitches.
Basic game works fine in Catalina. I'm sure the DLC's will work as well (never had a problem with them).
